title: Search for PPI table by specifying region, country and/or calculation type. — find_table
code: find_table(   region = steer$region,   country = steer$country[steer$region %in% region],   type = steer$type[steer$country %in% country] )

title: Search for PPI table by specifying region, country and/or calculation type. — find_table
text: region Region world search PPI table . Default c("Africa", "Asia", "Eastern Europe Central Asia", "Latin America Carribean", "Middle East North Africa"). Allows specification one region vector regions. country Country search PPI table . Default vector country names specified region/s. Allows specification one country name vector country names. type Type PPI calculation used. Can one two options: "sps" Simple Poverty Scorecard calculation "ipa" International Poverty Alliance calculation. Default vector calculation types available specified country/ies.

title: Search for PPI table by specifying region, country and/or calculation type. — find_table
text: data frame tibble format corresponding PPI table/s     matching search parameters. data frame contains information  region, country, description, survey year,  release year, calculation type, filename     returned PPI table/s.

title: Get PPI table/s based on a specified PPI table/s search output — get_table
text: region Region world search PPI table . Default c("Africa", "Asia", "Eastern Europe Central Asia", "Latin America Carribean", "Middle East North Africa"). Allows specification one region vector regions. country Country search PPI table . Default vector country names specified region/s. Allows specification one country name vector country names. type Type PPI calculation used. Can one two options: "sps" Simple Poverty Scorecard calculation ipa International Poverty Alliance calculation. Default vector calculation types available specified country/ies.

title: Get PPI table/s based on a specified PPI table/s search output — get_table
text: data frame tibble format corresponding PPI table/s     matching search parameters. data frame tidy format     contains corresponding poverty probability (ppi)     specific score (score) various poverty definitions)     country (country) PPI calculation type (type).

what: Poverty Probability Index (PPI) Lookup Tables — ppitables
title: Poverty Probability Index (PPI) Lookup Tables — ppitables
text: Poverty Probability Index (PPI) poverty measurement tool organizations businesses mission serve poor. PPI statistically-sound, yet simple use: answers 10 questions household’s characteristics asset ownership scored compute likelihood household living poverty line – narrow margin.

title: Poverty Probability Index (PPI) Lookup Tables — ppitables
text: Maintainer: Ernest Guevarra ernestgmd@gmail.com (ORCID)
